  1. base

Uses of Package
base

Packages that use base
Package
Description
base
Core game classes for the JEST card game.
card
Card type classes for the JEST card game.
player
Player type classes for the JEST card game.
strategy
Strategy pattern classes for player decision-making.
strategy.typestrategy
Concrete AI strategy implementations for virtual players.
trophy
Trophy classes for the JEST card game.
visitor
Visitor pattern classes for card scoring.
  • Classes in base used by base
    Class
    Description
    Card
    Abstract base class representing a card in the JEST game.
    Deck
    Represents the deck of cards used in the JEST game.
    Game.TrophyType
    Trophy types based on card conditions.
    Jest
    Represents a player's Jest (collection of won cards).
    Offer
    Represents a player's offer during a round.
    Player
    Abstract base class representing a player in the JEST game.
